sentences.text:
We could not reliably update prod to the 3.1 branch without complications, so
Tuesday night we need an outage window to update AMO prod to the 3.1 branch
safely.
A part of this will also push the cakephp core upgrade and l10n upgrades.

So
it can't be done reliably outside of a window.
Please run the following SQL on AMO production with this update:

ALTER TABLE `addons` ADD `publicstats` TINYINT( 1 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT
'0' AFTER `viewsource`;

mysql> ALTER TABLE `addons` ADD `publicstats` TINYINT( 1 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL
DEFAULT
mysql> DELETE FROM update_counts WHERE date='2008-02-28';

U    site/vendors/product-details/history/thunderbirdHistory.class.php
U    site/vendors/product-details/thunderbirdDetails.class.php
Updated external to revision 10782.
Does that file have local changes?

That was the tshirt patch from last week, pushed locally until we got to a
window.

This was rolled back to r10785 preemptively when we noticed sessions were on
auto-start.
Analyzing a fix for this, tracked in bug 421055.

Wil has a fix in for the session bug, we verified that sessions don't spin out
of control -- we'd like to push this tonight if possible.
Looks like the fix hasn't yet been tagged.
